name: ASD (SundedoW)
description:
/!\ This is my first game. (and there will be update for it in the future.) /!\

ASD is a 2 player local duel game.

You start with 3 lives and no ammo, your goal is to kill your opponent.

P1 Controls :

A = Reload ammo

S = Shoot

D = Defend

P2 Controls :

J = Reload ammo

K = Shoot

L = Defend

Do not press multiple buttons at the same time or your character will be confused for a tick.
